summary: a large-scale outbreak of diarrhea has been observed in swine farms in china. a large-scale outbreak of diarrhea was caused by highly virulent PEDV variants. the immune protective efficiency of YC2014 was determined by testing PEDV neutralizing antibodies in sera, the colostrum and the milk. the traditional inactivated PEDV vaccines made from CV777 or DR13 could not protect piglets from YC2014 challenge. the traditional inactivated PEDV vaccines made from CV777 or DR13 could provide piglets with 100 % protection against YC2014 challenge.
